forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 50. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight settles gently over Downtown San Francisco, the air is crisp and carries the subtle fragrance of the bay, couched beneath a wide, clear sky. The shoreline reveals no trace of the notorious fog that often cloaks the Golden Gate; instead, the city basks in the soft embrace of serenity, with the temperature slipping to around 50 degrees as night unfolds. There's a gentle whisper of wind, barely rustling the leaves, as if nature itself is settling down for the evening.

Looking ahead to Sunday, expect the sun to rise in full splendor, casting a warm glow over the city, with temperatures climbing to a pleasant high near 70. By afternoon, a light breeze will sweep through the streets, making it an ideal time for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to one of the city's many vibrant parks. Dress in layers, as the mornings may still carry a hint of chill, but as day progresses, a light shirt or dress will embrace the warmth, inviting you to indulge in all the outdoor pleasures this beautiful city has to offer. The clear skies present a perfect backdrop for exploring local cafes or galleries, inviting both quiet reflection and the buzz of conversation as people savor a rare, cloudless spring day.
